category.name: wcf.like
category.item: Reacted with {@$like->render()} to the to-do {$todo->getTitle()}.
Reacted with {@$like->render()} to the comment by {if $commentAuthor}{$commentAuthor->username}{else}a guest{/if} on the to-do {$todo->getTitle()}.

Reacted with {@$like->render()} to the reply {if $responseAuthor}by {$responseAuthor->username}{else}by a guest{/if} on the comment by {if $commentAuthor}{$commentAuthor->username}{else}a guest{/if} on the to-do {$todo->getTitle()}.

category.item: Do you confirm to delete this to-do?

category.name: todolist.comment
category.item: Allow users to comment on this to-do.
{$author} reacted to your comment on the to-do {$todo->getTitle()} ({@$__wcf->getReactionHandler()->renderInlineList($reactions)}).

{if $count < 4}{@$authors[0]->getAnchorTag()}{if $count == 2} and {else}, {/if}{@$authors[1]->getAnchorTag()}{if $count == 3} and {@$authors[2]->getAnchorTag()}{/if}{else}{@$authors[0]->getAnchorTag()} and {#$others} others{/if} reacted to your comment on the to-do {$todo->getTitle()} ({@$__wcf->getReactionHandler()->renderInlineList($reactions)}).
{if $author->userID}{$author}{else}A guest{/if} commented on your to-do {$todo->getTitle()}.

{if $count < 4}{@$authors[0]->getAnchorTag()}{if $count != 1}{if $count == 2 && !$guestTimesTriggered} and {else}, {/if}{@$authors[1]->getAnchorTag()}{if $count == 3}{if !$guestTimesTriggered} and {else}, {/if} {@$authors[2]->getAnchorTag()}{/if}{/if}{if $guestTimesTriggered} and {if $guestTimesTriggered == 1}a guest{else}guests{/if}{/if}{else}{@$authors[0]->getAnchorTag()}{if $guestTimesTriggered},{else} and{/if} {#$others} other users {if $guestTimesTriggered}and {if $guestTimesTriggered == 1}a guest{else}guests{/if}{/if}{/if} commented on your to-do {$todo->getTitle()}.

category.name: todolist.like
category.item: {$author} reacted to your to-do {$todo->getTitle()} ({@$__wcf->getReactionHandler()->renderInlineList($reactions)}).
